pageSetting.title: 存贷款个人利润明细

select.isEqual: select tjny,zh,zhmc,khh,cpmc,kmh,kmmc,qx,khjg,nll,ftpjg,zhye, dqfpgx,hyye,hyrjye,ftplxsr,zbjsr,tqlxzckh,lxzc,mnlr from ( select $tjny$ as tjny, mx.zhdh as zh, mx.zhhm as zhmc, mx.khh, cp.cpmc, mx.kmh, km.kmmc, qx.qxmc as qx, jg.jgmc as khjg, mx.nll, mx.zyjg as ftpjg, mx.zhye, mx.zlbl as dqfpgx, mx.hyye, (case when $sd$ = 1 then (coalesce(mx.hyylj, 0) / cast(f_get_days(sj.yc, sj.ym) as float)) when $sd$ = 2 then (coalesce(mx.hyjlj, 0) / cast(f_get_days(sj.jc, sj.ym) as float)) when $sd$ = 3 then (coalesce(mx.hynlj, 0) / cast(f_get_days(sj.nc, sj.ym) as float)) end) as hyrjye, (case when $sd$ = 1 then coalesce(mx.yftpsr,0) when $sd$ = 2 then coalesce(mx.jftpsr, 0) when $sd$ = 3 then coalesce(mx.nftpsr,0) end) as ftplxsr, (case when $sd$ = 1 then coalesce(mx.yzbjsr,0) when $sd$ = 2 then coalesce(mx.jzbjsr, 0) when $sd$ = 3 then coalesce(mx.nzbjsr,0) end) as zbjsr, (case when $sd$ = 1 then coalesce(mx.ytqzqlxkh,0) when $sd$ = 2 then coalesce(mx.jtqzqlxkh, 0) when $sd$ = 3 then coalesce(mx.ntqzqlxkh,0) end) as tqlxzckh, (case when $sd$ = 1 then coalesce(mx.ylxzc,0) when $sd$ = 2 then coalesce(mx.jlxzc, 0) when $sd$ = 3 then coalesce(mx.nlxzc,0) end) as lxzc, (case when $sd$ = 1 then coalesce(mx.ylr,0) when $sd$ = 2 then coalesce(mx.jlr, 0) when $sd$ = 3 then coalesce(mx.nlr,0) end) as mnlr from nbzz_cklrmx_$tjny$ mx inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.jgdh = mx.jgdh left join csb_cpxz cp on cp.cpdh= mx.cpdh and cp.jxdxlx = 1 inner join csb_qxsdb qx on mx.qx between qx.qsqx and qx.jsqx and qx.jxdxlx = 1 inner join csb_km km on km.kmh = mx.kmh inner join csb_sjw sj on sj.tjrq = mx.tjrq and substr(cast(sj.tjrq as char(8)), 1, 6) = cast($tjny$ as char(6)) where 1=1 and mx.zhbs = '$zhbs$' and mx.khdxdh = $khdxdh$ and mx.khh like '%$khh$%' and mx.zhdh like '%$zh$%' and mx.zhhm like '%$zhmc$%' ) a order by a.mnlr desc, a.hyrjye desc, a.khh asc

select tjny,zh,zhmc,khh,cpmc,kmh,kmmc,qx,khjg,nll,ftpjg,zhye, dqfpgx,hyye,hyrjye,lxsr,ftplxzc,zcjzzb,yswslxxz,mnlr from ( select $tjny$ as tjny, mx.zhdh as zh, mx.zhhm as zhmc, mx.khh, cp.cpmc, mx.kmh, km.kmmc, qx.qxmc as qx, jg.jgmc as khjg, mx.nll, mx.zyjg as ftpjg, mx.zhye, mx.zlbl as dqfpgx, mx.hyye, (case when $sd$ = 1 then (coalesce(mx.hyylj, 0) / cast(f_get_days(sj.yc, sj.ym) as float)) when $sd$ = 2 then (coalesce(mx.hyjlj, 0) / cast(f_get_days(sj.jc, sj.ym) as float)) when $sd$ = 3 then (coalesce(mx.hynlj, 0) / cast(f_get_days(sj.nc, sj.ym) as float)) end) as hyrjye, (case when $sd$ = 1 then coalesce(mx.ylxsr,0) when $sd$ = 2 then coalesce(mx.jlxsr, 0) when $sd$ = 3 then coalesce(mx.nlxsr,0) end) as lxsr, (case when $sd$ = 1 then coalesce(mx.yftplxzc,0) when $sd$ = 2 then coalesce(mx.jftplxzc, 0) when $sd$ = 3 then coalesce(mx.nftplxzc,0) end) as ftplxzc, (case when $sd$ = 1 then coalesce(mx.yzcjzss,0) when $sd$ = 2 then coalesce(mx.jzcjzss, 0) when $sd$ = 3 then coalesce(mx.nzcjzss,0) end) as zcjzzb, (case when $sd$ = 1 then coalesce(mx.yyswslxxz,0) when $sd$ = 2 then coalesce(mx.jyswslxxz, 0) when $sd$ = 3 then coalesce(mx.nyswslxxz,0) end) as yswslxxz, (case when $sd$ = 1 then coalesce(mx.ylr,0) when $sd$ = 2 then coalesce(mx.jlr, 0) when $sd$ = 3 then coalesce(mx.nlr,0) end) as mnlr from nbzz_dklrmx_$tjny$ mx inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.jgdh = mx.jgdh left join csb_cpxz cp on cp.cpdh= mx.cpdh and cp.jxdxlx = 2 inner join csb_qxsdb qx on mx.qx between qx.qsqx and qx.jsqx and qx.jxdxlx = 2 inner join csb_km km on km.kmh = mx.kmh inner join csb_sjw sj on sj.tjrq = mx.tjrq and substr(cast(sj.tjrq as char(8)), 1, 6) = cast($tjny$ as char(6)) where 1=1 and mx.zhbs = '$zhbs$' and mx.khdxdh = $khdxdh$ and mx.khh like '%$khh$%' and mx.zhdh like '%$zh$%' and mx.zhhm like '%$zhmc$%' ) a order by a.mnlr desc, a.hyrjye desc, a.khh asc

sqlMap.select:
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from ( select tjny,zh,zhmc,khh,cpmc,kmh,kmmc,qx,khjg,nll,ftpjg,zhye, dqfpgx,hyye,hyrjye,ftplxsr,zbjsr,tqlxzckh,lxzc,mnlr from ( select $tjny$ as tjny, mx.zhdh as zh, mx.zhhm as zhmc, mx.khh, cp.cpmc, mx.kmh, km.kmmc, qx.qxmc as qx, jg.jgmc as khjg, mx.nll, mx.zyjg as ftpjg, mx.zhye, mx.zlbl as dqfpgx, mx.hyye, (case when $sd$ = 1 then (coalesce(mx.hyylj, 0) / cast(f_get_days(sj.yc, sj.ym) as float)) when $sd$ = 2 then (coalesce(mx.hyjlj, 0) / cast(f_get_days(sj.jc, sj.ym) as float)) when $sd$ = 3 then (coalesce(mx.hynlj, 0) / cast(f_get_days(sj.nc, sj.ym) as float)) end) as hyrjye, (case when $sd$ = 1 then coalesce(mx.yftpsr,0) when $sd$ = 2 then coalesce(mx.jftpsr, 0) when $sd$ = 3 then coalesce(mx.nftpsr,0) end) as ftplxsr, (case when $sd$ = 1 then coalesce(mx.yzbjsr,0) when $sd$ = 2 then coalesce(mx.jzbjsr, 0) when $sd$ = 3 then coalesce(mx.nzbjsr,0) end) as zbjsr, (case when $sd$ = 1 then coalesce(mx.ytqzqlxkh,0) when $sd$ = 2 then coalesce(mx.jtqzqlxkh, 0) when $sd$ = 3 then coalesce(mx.ntqzqlxkh,0) end) as tqlxzckh, (case when $sd$ = 1 then coalesce(mx.ylxzc,0) when $sd$ = 2 then coalesce(mx.jlxzc, 0) when $sd$ = 3 then coalesce(mx.nlxzc,0) end) as lxzc, (case when $sd$ = 1 then coalesce(mx.ylr,0) when $sd$ = 2 then coalesce(mx.jlr, 0) when $sd$ = 3 then coalesce(mx.nlr,0) end) as mnlr from nbzz_cklrmx_$tjny$ mx inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.jgdh = mx.jgdh left join csb_cpxz cp on cp.cpdh= mx.cpdh and cp.jxdxlx = 1 inner join csb_qxsdb qx on mx.qx between qx.qsqx and qx.jsqx and qx.jxdxlx = 1 inner join csb_km km on km.kmh = mx.kmh inner join csb_sjw sj on sj.tjrq = mx.tjrq and substr(cast(sj.tjrq as char(8)), 1, 6) = cast($tjny$ as char(6)) where 1=1 and mx.zhbs = '$zhbs$' and mx.khdxdh = $khdxdh$ and mx.khh like '%$khh$%' and mx.zhdh like '%$zh$%' and mx.zhhm like '%$zhmc$%' ) a order by a.mnlr desc, a.hyrjye desc, a.khh asc
select tjny,zh,zhmc,khh,cpmc,kmh,kmmc,qx,khjg,nll,ftpjg,zhye, dqfpgx,hyye,hyrjye,lxsr,ftplxzc,zcjzzb,yswslxxz,mnlr from ( select $tjny$ as tjny, mx.zhdh as zh, mx.zhhm as zhmc, mx.khh, cp.cpmc, mx.kmh, km.kmmc, qx.qxmc as qx, jg.jgmc as khjg, mx.nll, mx.zyjg as ftpjg, mx.zhye, mx.zlbl as dqfpgx, mx.hyye, (case when $sd$ = 1 then (coalesce(mx.hyylj, 0) / cast(f_get_days(sj.yc, sj.ym) as float)) when $sd$ = 2 then (coalesce(mx.hyjlj, 0) / cast(f_get_days(sj.jc, sj.ym) as float)) when $sd$ = 3 then (coalesce(mx.hynlj, 0) / cast(f_get_days(sj.nc, sj.ym) as float)) end) as hyrjye, (case when $sd$ = 1 then coalesce(mx.ylxsr,0) when $sd$ = 2 then coalesce(mx.jlxsr, 0) when $sd$ = 3 then coalesce(mx.nlxsr,0) end) as lxsr, (case when $sd$ = 1 then coalesce(mx.yftplxzc,0) when $sd$ = 2 then coalesce(mx.jftplxzc, 0) when $sd$ = 3 then coalesce(mx.nftplxzc,0) end) as ftplxzc, (case when $sd$ = 1 then coalesce(mx.yzcjzss,0) when $sd$ = 2 then coalesce(mx.jzcjzss, 0) when $sd$ = 3 then coalesce(mx.nzcjzss,0) end) as zcjzzb, (case when $sd$ = 1 then coalesce(mx.yyswslxxz,0) when $sd$ = 2 then coalesce(mx.jyswslxxz, 0) when $sd$ = 3 then coalesce(mx.nyswslxxz,0) end) as yswslxxz, (case when $sd$ = 1 then coalesce(mx.ylr,0) when $sd$ = 2 then coalesce(mx.jlr, 0) when $sd$ = 3 then coalesce(mx.nlr,0) end) as mnlr from nbzz_dklrmx_$tjny$ mx inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.jgdh = mx.jgdh left join csb_cpxz cp on cp.cpdh= mx.cpdh and cp.jxdxlx = 2 inner join csb_qxsdb qx on mx.qx between qx.qsqx and qx.jsqx and qx.jxdxlx = 2 inner join csb_km km on km.kmh = mx.kmh inner join csb_sjw sj on sj.tjrq = mx.tjrq and substr(cast(sj.tjrq as char(8)), 1, 6) = cast($tjny$ as char(6)) where 1=1 and mx.zhbs = '$zhbs$' and mx.khdxdh = $khdxdh$ and mx.khh like '%$khh$%' and mx.zhdh like '%$zh$%' and mx.zhhm like '%$zhmc$%' ) a order by a.mnlr desc, a.hyrjye desc, a.khh asc ) t
